get.description:
Returns list of Installations given by location point, ordered by distance to that point, which are not further than 'maxDistanceKM'.
Returns at most 'maxResults' items.
If no installation is found within 'maxDistanceKM' from the location point, returns empty list.

parameters.name: maxDistanceKM
parameters.description: Max distance in km. Negative values mean 'infinity' (no distance limit). Optional parameter, if omitted defaults to 3km.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Max results to return. Negative values mean 'infinity' (no results limit). Optional parameter, if omitted defaults to 1 item.

get.description: Returns single Installation given by the installationId path parameter

200.description: Installation's info with coordinates, address etc

301.description: Installation was replaced by another installation in this location. Please follow redirect.

get.description:
Returns detailed measurements (current, historical and future) for an installation. 
History and forecast are in 1h timeframes for 24h in past and future, sorted in ascending order.
Returns 404 in case installation doesn't exist.

parameters.name: indexType
parameters.description: Select index which should be returned in response

200.description: Measurements of the Installation given by id

301.description: Installation was replaced by another installation in this location. Please follow redirect.

Location.description: url pointing to measurements of the installation replacement

404.description: No Installation was found by the given id

get.description:
Returns detailed measurements (current, historical and future) from the installation which is closest to a given point, but not further than specified distance limit (in km). 
History and forecast are in 1h timeframes for 24h in past and future, sorted in ascending order.
Returns 404 in case no installation could be found within the given distance from point.

parameters.name: indexType
parameters.description: Select index which should be returned in response

parameters.name: maxDistanceKM
parameters.description: Max distance in km. Negative values mean 'infinity' (no results limit). Optional parameter, if omitted defaults to 3km.

200.description: Measurements of the installation nearest to given point

404.description: No installation was found within given distance from point

get.summary: Get measurements for a point on map
get.description:
Returns detailed measurements (current, historical and future) for a map point, which can be interpolated from nearby installations. 
History and forecast are in 1h timeframes for 24h in past and future, sorted in ascending order.

parameters.name: indexType
parameters.description: Select index which should be returned in response

200.description: Point measurements interpolated from nearby Installations

get.description: Returns list of IndexTypes supported by the platform
Returns list of MeasurementTypes supported by the platform

fromDateTime.description: Left bound of the time period over which average measurements were calculated, inclusive, always UTC

tillDateTime.description: Right bound of the time period over which average measurements were calculated, exclusive, always UTC

values.description: List of raw measurements, averaged over specified period. Measurement types available in this list depend on the capabilities of the queried installation, e.g. particulate matter (PM1, PM25, PM10), gases (CO, NO2, SO2, O3) or weather conditions (temperature, humidity, pressure)

indexes.description: List of indexes calculated from the values available. Indexes are defined by relevant national and international institutions, e.g. EU, GIOŚ or US EPA

standards.description: List of 'standard' values, or 'limits' for pollutants that should not be exceeded over certain period of time. Limits are defined by relevant national and international institutions, like e.g. WHO or EPA. For each standard limit in this list there is also a corresponding measurement expressed as a percent value of the limit

description.description: Text describing this air quality level. Text translation is returned according to language specified in the request (English being default)

advice.example: Don’t hesitate to go out today
advice.description: Piece of advice from Airly regarding air quality. Text translation is returned according to language specified in the request (English being default)

color.description: Color representing this index level, given by hexadecimal css-style triplet

minValue.description: Minimum index value for this level

maxValue.description: Maximum index value for this level

values.description: Values range for this index level

color.description: Color representing this index level, given by hexadecimal css-style triplet

airly.description: Indicates if this is Airly sensor

name.description: Identifier of this measurement type. Also used as 'name' identifier in 'measurements' API

label.description: Short name of this measurement type. This is a translated field and will contain value according to Access-Language header

Measurements.title: Measurements
Measurements.description:
Current, historical and future measurements.

The 'current' field contains average measurements calculated over a period of last 1 hour. 

The 'history' field contains 24 average measurements calculated over periods of last 24 hours. 

The 'forecast' field contains 24 future average measurements that we anticipate.

percent.description: Pollutant measurement as percent of allowable limit
